posts.post_content:
This guy is also weak against "infect", [Black Sun's Zenith](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Black Sun's Zenith), [Tragic Slip](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Tragic Slip), [Mutilate](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mutilate), [Oblivion ring](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Oblivion ring), [Revoke Existence](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Revoke Existence), [Dismember](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Dismember)...   
  
Indestructible is a very misleading ability for new players. Part of the 3 most confusing abiltiys..  
1) Hexproof... Why is your wrath killing it!!!  
2) Indestructible... Why is your -X/-X killing it!!  
3) Protection... Why does this die to wrath again?? hes protection from white!!!   
  
 Its still a very good card. Hard to win against if you dont have an answer.
posts.html:

2) Indestructible... Why is your -X/-X killing it!!
3) Protection... Why does this die to wrath again?? hes protection from white!!!

Its still a very good card. Hard to win against if you dont have an answer.

posts.post_content: Goes pretty nicely with the [Inquisitor's Flail](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Inquisitor's Flail). It deals double the damage, and receives double the damage. With one flail, you could be dealing 4 damage a turn. With two flails, you'd be dealing 8 damage a turn.

posts.post_content:
I threw together a deck around this guy like 5 minutes ago. I haven't played it yet but everyone tell me what you think:  
  
4x Stuffy doll  
4x Shivan meteor  
4x Pariah  
4x Obelisk of naya  
1x Garruk relentless  
4x Lightning bolt  
4x Dawn charm  
4x March of souls  
4x Wear away  
4x Aftershock  
4x Mwonvuli beast tracker  
1x Sunhome, fortress of the legion  
4x Kher keep  
5x Forest  
5x Plains  
4x Mountain  
  
If you're wondering why there's a Sunhome there, it's so that you can give your enemies double strike when they are blocked by stuffy.

posts.post_content:
I'm thinking multiple stuffies would make for some fun games in multiplayer. I'll have to obtain a few more and test that out.   
  
For now though I'm using him in conjunction with [Ulvenwald Tracker](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ulvenwald Tracker) and whatever biggest creature I have on the battlefield at any given time since I can just make a heavy fight Stuffy Doll and my opponent gets to enjoy the show in the form of direct damage.
